## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cb5f0b4d8a20b23a261bca2323ce8fbbbea6f868f64ab6aa260be08dd59ee6e7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'httprequesting' @ 3.0.1 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
